name: Myrthen Coronet
description: Joy blossoms in the Myrthen Coronet.

languages.description: Freude erblüht durch die Zierde: Myrthen.
languages.name: Zierde: Myrthen

languages.description: La joie s'épanouit dans la Couronne de Myrthe.
languages.name: Couronne de Myrthe

languages.description: La gioia sboccia con la Corona Myrthen.
languages.name: Corona Myrthen

languages.description: 머튼 두관을 통해 기쁨이 꽃처럼 피어납니다.
languages.name: 머튼 두관

languages.description: La alegría florece en la Corona Myrthen.
languages.name: Corona Myrthen

languages.description: 欢乐在欢馨马冠中开花。
languages.name: 欢馨马冠

languages.description: Myrthenコロネットから喜びの花が舞い散る。
languages.name: Myrthen コロネット

languages.description: A alegria floresce na Coroa de Murta.
languages.name: Coroa de Murta

languages.description: 喜悅在愉綻馬冠裡盛開。
languages.name: 愉綻馬冠

languages.description: มงกุฎดอกไม้ Myrthen ที่เบ่งบานพาให้เบิกบานใจ
languages.name: มงกุฎ Myrthen

languages.description: Myrthen Tacının üzerinde neşe çiçek açıyor.
languages.name: Myrthen Taç
